#summary Sets the distance for alien pruning.
#labels D-Cvar

= Description =

If an alien that is prune-able is within this distance from any marine, it is not removed. If it is not within this distance from any marine, it will be removed on the next frame.

|| *Revision Added* || *Default* || *[CvarFlags Flags]* || *[OriginalCvarList Original Cvar]* ||
